label: ProductionCycle
comment: A series of activities associated with the processing of a product.

datatypeProperties.comment: A process applicable to this specified production cycle.
The date, time, date time or other date time value for the end of this available period of time.
A process document referenced for this specified production cycle.
The production year for this specified production cycle.
A binary file related to this production process.
The date, time, date time or other date time value for the start of this available period of time.

referencedBy.comment: A specified production cycle applicable to this production process.
